description.en: Slash evil with an ancestral megaphone! "Megaphone Samurai no Tora", which depicts the battle between Megaphone Samurai and Tora Jindo, will be published as a book for the first time! In 1995, when the J League was established, the world was filled with soccer! The era when the national sport was revised from baseball to soccer! After confiscating megaphones (megaphone hunting) from the J Shogunate, professional baseball fans were forced to convert to soccer fans after being sorted out with fumi professional baseball cards, and if they refused, they were executed with direct free kicks! The last Hanshin Tigers fan to face the misgovernment of the J Shogunate alone! Even though it was still July, Director Katsuhiro Nakamura took a break from taking responsibility for being 20 games away from the leader, and second team manager Taira Fujita took over as acting manager. In order to keep professional baseball alive, Shindojo continues to fight against numerous assassins sent by the J Shogunate! In addition, Tokumitsu's baseball-related short cartoons are also included! "The Sacrifice of the Filial Buffalo" depicts a ritual that has been held since ancient times to calm the volcano! 2003 A.D. "Hanshin DAYS" where you can talk about your thoughts on the Hanshin Tigers, who won the Central League championship for the first time in 18 years, with the characters in your manga! Includes "Moero! Baseball Board!!", which spells out the memories of the "Deluxe Baseball Board" released by Epoch in 1970! In addition, the trailer of Tokumitsu baseball manga trilogy "Megaton Kyudan" following "DAT DAYS" and "Megaphone Samurai Tiger" is also included! Total page 119 pages! Please take a look!
